import React, {Component} from 'react' import '../css/Table.css' const USER_SERVICE_URL = 'StartApi.ashx?Platform=Android&ProcessType='; class ArticelsTable extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { isFetching: false, articels: [], orders: [], isShow: true , ismodalvisible:false, waybill: [], onewaybill:[], Piece:0, Dimensions:0, Color:"", TypeName:"", TypeId:0, loopcount:0, totalOutPiece:0, totalOutWeight:0 }; this.GetOrders = this.GetOrders.bind(this) } Closeproductmodal(){ this.setState({ ismodalvisible:false}); } TransferSummary(weight,piece){ this.setState({ totalOutPiece:1+piece,totalOutWeight:1+weight,loopcount:99}); } async GetWayBillPhoto(WayBillId){ } async GetOrderEdit(OrderId,Dimensions,Color,Piece,ProductTypeName) { this.setState({ismodalvisible:true, Piece: Piece,Dimensions:Dimensions,Color:Color,ProductTypeName:ProductTypeName}); const response = await fetch(USER_SERVICE_URL+"Orders&ArticelId="+OrderId, { method: "POST", cache: "no-cache", mode: "cors", headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', "access-control-allow-credentials": false, "Access-Control-Allow-Origin":USER_SERVICE_URL+"Orders&ArticelId="+OrderId, "Authorization": "bearer " }, }); }; async GetWaybillforOrder(OrderId,dimensions,color,producttypename){ this.setState({Dimensions:dimensions,Color:color,ProductTypeName:producttypename}); const response = await fetch(USER_SERVICE_URL+"Motion&MotionType=One&OrderId="+OrderId, { method: "POST", cache: "no-cache", mode: "cors", headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', "access-control-allow-credentials": false, "Access-Control-Allow-Origin":USER_SERVICE_URL+"Motion&MotionType=One&OrderId="+OrderId, "Authorization": "bearer " }, }); this.setState({ onewaybill: await response.json()}); var wayPiece=0; var wayWeight=0; this.state.onewaybill.map((w) => wayPiece=wayPiece+parseInt(w.Piece) ); this.setState({ loopcount:this.state.onewaybill.length,totalOutPiece:wayPiece,totalOutWeight:wayWeight}); } async GetOrders(ArticelId,ArticelName) { this.setState({ isShow:true}); document.getElementById("ArticelName").innerHTML=ArticelName; document.getElementById("SecondScreen").classList.add("col-md-6"); document.getElementById("FirstScreen").classList.add("col-md-6"); document.getElementById("FirstScreen").classList.remove("col-md-12"); const response = await fetch(USER_SERVICE_URL+"Orders&ArticelId="+ArticelId, { method: "POST", cache: "no-cache", mode: "cors", headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', "access-control-allow-credentials": false, "Access-Control-Allow-Origin":USER_SERVICE_URL+"Orders&ArticelId="+ArticelId, "Authorization": "bearer " }, }); this.setState({ orders: await response.json(),isShow:false}); }; render() { return (

) } componentDidMount() { this.fetcharticels(); } componentWillUnmount() { clearInterval(this.timer); this.timer = null; } async fetcharticelsAsync() { const response = await fetch(USER_SERVICE_URL+"Articels", { method: "POST", cache: "no-cache", mode: "cors", headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', "access-control-allow-credentials": false, "Access-Control-Allow-Origin":USER_SERVICE_URL+"Articels", "Authorization": "bearer " }, }); this.setState({ articels: await response.json(),isShow:false }); }; fetcharticels = this.fetcharticelsAsync; } export default ArticelsTable
